AdaughterofTagawaŚhichizaemon田川七左衛門inHirado.ChengCheng-kung鄭成功(1624-1662),i.e.,KoxsinjaorCoxingaderivedfromKuo-hsing-yeh国姓爺:"LordoftheImperialsurname",borninHirado,originallynamedChengSen鄭森In1645thePrinceofT'ang唐王,ie.EmperorLungWu隆武帝,proclaimedsuccessoroftheMingEmperorbyChengChi-lung,bestoweduponChengSentheimperialsurnameChu朱andorderedhisnamechangedtoCh'eng-kung.AfterthefallofFoochowin1646,hemadetheislandsAmoy廈門andQuemoy金門hispowerbase.În1658,heattackedNanking,butinvain.In1662,heconqueredTaiwananddiedthereinthesameyear.TextBgivesbecomen.TextBgiveswederomenquamTextBlacksthisword
